text: Logo TV (often shortened to Logo, and stylized as Logo.) is a American basic cable channel. It is owned by Paramount Media Networks, a division of Paramount Global. Launched in 2005, Logo was originally dedicated to lifestyle and entertainment programming targeting LGBT audiences. As of January 2016, about 50 million households receive Logo.The TV channel is same like an icon. == References == Category:2005 establishments in New York (state) Category:American television networks Category:2015 disestablishments in the United States
title: Logo TV
